assignments.name: Set_Company_Address_Same_As_Asset
assignments.label: Set Company Address Same As Asset

assignments.name: Set_Company_Address_Same_As_Domicile
assignments.label: Set Company Address Same As Domicile

assignments.name: Set_Company_Address_Same_As_Legal
assignments.label: Set Company Address Same As Legal

formulas.name: validate_DomicileLatitude_Min90Max90
formulas.expression: IF(OR(ISBLANK({!Contact_Domicile_Latitude}), AND({!Contact_Domicile_Latitude} >= -90, {!Contact_Domicile_Latitude} <= 90)), '', '- Latitude should be a decimal number in a range [-90, 90]')

formulas.name: validate_DomicileLongitude_Min90Max90
formulas.expression: IF(OR(ISBLANK({!Contact_Domicile_Longitude}), AND({!Contact_Domicile_Longitude} >= -180, {!Contact_Domicile_Longitude} <= 180)), '', '- Longitude should be a decimal number in a range [-180, 180]')

formulas.name: validate_IDNumber_Must16Digits
formulas.expression: IF(OR(ISBLANK({!Contact_ID_Number}), LEN({!Contact_ID_Number}) = 16), '', '- Please input 16 digit number')

formulas.name: validate_LegalLatitude_Min90Max90
formulas.expression: IF(OR(ISBLANK({!Contact_Legal_Latitude}), AND({!Contact_Legal_Latitude} >= -90, {!Contact_Legal_Latitude} <= 90)), '', '- Latitude should be a decimal number in a range [-90, 90]')

formulas.name: validate_LegalLongitude_Min90Max90
formulas.expression: IF(OR(ISBLANK({!Contact_Legal_Longitude}), AND({!Contact_Legal_Longitude} >= -180, {!Contact_Legal_Longitude} <= 180)), '', '- Longitude should be a decimal number in a range [-180, 180]')

formulas.name: validate_NPWP_Must1516Digits
formulas.expression: IF(OR(ISBLANK({!Contact_NPWP_Number}), LEN({!Contact_NPWP_Number}) = 16, LEN({!Contact_NPWP_Number}) = 15), '', '- Please input 15 or 16 digit number')

formulas.name: validate_SpouseIDNumber_Must16Digits
formulas.expression: IF(OR(ISBLANK({!Spouse_ID_Number}), LEN({!Spouse_ID_Number}) = 16), '', '- Please input 16 digit number')

formulas.name: validate_SpouseNPWPNumber_Must1516Digits
formulas.expression: IF(OR(ISBLANK({!Spouse_NPWP_Number}), LEN({!Spouse_NPWP_Number}) = 16, LEN({!Spouse_NPWP_Number}) = 15), '', '- Please input 15 or 16 digit number')

textTemplates.name: tpl_Asset_ZipCode
textTemplates.text: Select Zip_Code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where Id = '{!Asset_Kelurahan.selectedChoiceValues}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_Domicile_Zip_Code
textTemplates.text: Select Zip_Code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where Id = '{!func_GetSelectedDomicileKelurahanId}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_DomicileCity
textTemplates.text: Select Id,Name from City_Master_Data__c where Province_Id__c = '{!Contact_Domicile_Province.selectedChoiceValues}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_DomicileKecamatan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name from District_Master_Data__c where City_Id__c = '{!func_GetSelectedDomicileCityId}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_DomicileKelurahan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where District_Id__c = '{!func_GetSelectedDomicileKecamatanId}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_EmergencyContact_ZipCode
textTemplates.text: Select Zip_Code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where Id = '{!Emergency_Contact_Kelurahan.selectedChoiceValues}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_Job_ZipCode
textTemplates.text: Select Zip_Code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where Id = '{!Job_Kelurahan.selectedChoiceValues}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_Legal_Zip_Code
textTemplates.text: select Zip_Code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where Id = '{!func_GetSelectedKelurahanId}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_LegalCity
textTemplates.text: Select Id,Name from City_Master_Data__c where Province_Id__c = '{!Contact_Legal_Province.selectedChoiceValues}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_LegalKecamatan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name from District_Master_Data__c where City_Id__c = '{!func_GetSelectedCityId}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_LegalKelurahan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where District_Id__c = '{!func_GetSelectedKecamatanId}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_PemilikSertipikat_ZipCode
textTemplates.text: Select Zip_Code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where Id = '{!PemilikSertipikat_Kelurahan.selectedChoiceValues}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_SpouseJob_ZipCode
textTemplates.text: Select Zip_Code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where Id = '{!Spouse_Job_Kelurahan.selectedChoiceValues}'
